idea:

We set records...introduce trends...create history...every single day.

idea:
Whether you are sleeping, training, working or relaxing, your body is always functioning. Your body emits energy in the form of Far Infrared Energy (FIE) 24 hours a day. This means that as much as you may try, you are always losing precious energy.

Baller Athletik makes performance clothing containing a combination of bio-ceramic minerals infused into the fabric that reflect this energy (FIE) directly back into your body, a kind of replenishing. Your body uses this extra energy boost to optimise all kinds of processes to improve your performance, improve your balance, speed up recovery and reduce fatigue.

Worn and recommended by some of the highest performers in sport from IPL, ISL, Pro Kabaddi to the Olympics, Baller Athletik is your second skin that will help you train harder, recoup faster and sleep better. From sports and working out to sleeping and travelling, serving a special purpose to suit your lifestyle.

We believe in making your best, better. We are a community of athletes with the attitude of discipline, perseverance and mindful of our objectives. As important as winning is, it’s more about giving it everything you’ve got, to push yourself beyond what you previously thought possible.
name: BALLER ATHLETIK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
AQUATEIN is India's first high protein water available in a 21g and a 10g variant. It's a ready to drink protein beverage with BCAA's and Glutamine. It is Fat free, Carb free, Sugar free, Lactose free and it's available in 4 delicious flavours.

Athlex Beverages Private Limited is the manufacturer of Aquatein products and our company is always striving to bring forward new and innovative products to the Indian market.
name: ATHLEX BEVERAGES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
As a technically astute, creative, and detail-driven Freelance Photographer with five years of excellent experience managing a variety of photoshoots for diverse clients, I am positioned to make a significant impact and capture your special memories by putting my knowledge and expertise to work for you.s

Highlights of my experience include:

· Managing all facets of my personal photography business, including sales and self-marketing, equipment purchasing, bookkeeping, assistant hiring/training, and networking.

· Demonstrating expertise in digital photography processes, equipment, and methods; photo evaluation and editing; and final product delivery.

· I am a Bachelor of Commerce & diploma in Photography and Knowledge about LightRoom, Photoshop, and Capture 1.

I look forward to discussing your needs, and my qualifications, in more detail. Thank you for your consideration.
name: Nikhivaidya photography
